name: Rent-a-Monster (LD33)
description:
Made in 72h for Ludum Dare #33 jam with @thomas_baudon.

Play as an imperialist human, sent in the monster world to rent their service to your homeworld and make profit.

Match the better monster profile to the better mission and take care to special traits!

Use your different folder to buy monster and assign them to missions.

Click on the calendar to go to the next day.
